description: College Park police are looking for two men they say robbed, shot and killed a man Friday on Roosevelt Highway.
title: Man shot, killed at College Park gas station
title_page: Man shot, killed at College Park gas station
text:
College Park police are looking for two men they say robbed, shot and killed a man Friday on Roosevelt Highway.
The shooting happened around 2 p.m. at an Exxon station, according to College Park police Maj. Ernest Strozier. The victim, whose name has not been released, pulled up to a set of gas pumps, where he was accosted by two men.
The assailants took money from the man and shot him, Strozier said. The man died from his injuries.
Charges of robbery and homicide are pending against the two unknown assailants, Strozier said.
Anyone with information about this incident should call 911.
